verify((uint128,uint128,bytes32,bytes),b.details: Verifies that a request is signed by an authorized account.

documentation.text: @dev Mapping from a signed request UID => whether the request is processed.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct ISignatureAction.GenericRequest calldata,bytes calldata) view returns (address)

documentation.text: @dev Verifies that a request is signed by an authorized account.
@dev Returns whether a given address is authorized to sign requests.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct ISignatureAction.GenericRequest calldata,bytes calldata) view returns (bool,address)

documentation.text: @dev Verifies a request and marks the request as processed.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct ISignatureAction.GenericRequest calldata) pure returns (bytes memory)

documentation.text: @dev Returns the address of the signer of the request.
@dev Encodes a request for recovery of the signer in `recoverAddress`.
